data.description:
Welcome to VIVERSE for Business, your premier platform for effortlessly creating immersive virtual environments. With VIVERSE for Business, transform hybrid work dynamics within your organization, fostering collaboration and bridging global talent gaps seamlessly.
 
Key Features:
．High-Fidelity 3D Visualization: Experience unparalleled detail with our unique technology, ensuring smooth delivery of intricate 3D content.
．Customizable Avatars and Interactive Features: Personalize your virtual presence and engage in interactive discussions effortlessly.
．Enterprise-Grade Security and Privacy: Rest assured with VIVERSE for Business's robust security measures, safeguarding your data and privacy at every step.
．Seamless Integration: Access your immersive environments seamlessly, ensuring connectivity regardless of location, including on Oculus devices.
 
Why Choose VIVERSE for Business:
．Enhanced Productivity and Engagement: Empower your team with tools that elevate productivity, connectivity, and engagement within immersive environments.
．Compliance and Reliability: VIVERSE for Business adheres to industry regulations and standards, backed by reliable infrastructure and continuous support.

Download VIVERSE for Business now and unlock the potential of immersive collaboration for your organization.

changelog.change_log:
•	Live captions and meeting minutes are now available on macOS devices.
•	The font size of live captions can now be changed in the VIVERSE for Business desktop app settings.
•	You can now use hand tracking when accessing VIVERSE for Business on Quest series devices.
•	The Library in the User Console can now display thumbnails for PPTs, PDFs, and image files.
•	Polygon Streaming has been added to VIVERSE for Business.
•	You can now share up to 3 screens of web and desktop content at the same time.
•	You can now share web and desktop content from your PC or macOS device in high resolution (1080p).

What’s new

ENG

•	Display up to 10 images inside a space at the same time.

•	Images can be displayed on the floor or Gallery wall for greater flexibility. 

•	Lock 3D models in place to prevent accidental movement or manipulation. 

•	Mirror files shared to the Big Screen in a separate content window (VR). 

•	View files shared to the Big Screen in full screen mode (desktop and mobile). 


User experience improvements

ENG

•	Avatar movements have been enhanced to look more natural. 

•	Share your desktop when using VIVERSE for Business in macOS. 

•	Access the Global version of VFB by signing in to your VIVEPORT account on XR Elite and Focus 3 headsets. 

•	Control your avatar on mobile devices by using the onscreen virtual joystick. 

•	Add interactive links and immersive images via the Management Console for more engaging and visually appealing spaces.
